peril.ai.api

Interface Player

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ModelPlayer

    public interface Player
    Provides information about a player.
    Since:
    2018-02-20
    Version:
    1.01.03
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getContinentsRuled()
      Retrieves the number of Continents this Player rules
      int getCountriesRuled()
      Retrieves the number of Countrys this Player rules.
      Army getDistributableArmy()
      Retrieves the Army that this Player has available to distribute during the reinforce state of the game.
      int getDistributableArmyStrength()
      Deprecated. 
      use getDistributableArmy() then Army.getStrength()
      int getPoints()
      Retrieves all the number of points that this Player has.
      Army getTotalArmy()
      Retrieves all the units in the Countrys that this Player owns combined.
      int getTotalArmyStrength()
      Deprecated. 
      use getTotalArmy() then Army.getStrength()

    • Method Detail

      • getTotalArmyStrength

        int getTotalArmyStrength()
        Deprecated. use getTotalArmy() then Army.getStrength()
        Retrieves the strength of all the units in the Countrys that this Player owns combined.
        Returns:
        Total army strength.

      • getCountriesRuled

        int getCountriesRuled()
        Retrieves the number of Countrys this Player rules.
        Returns:
        Number of Countrys ruled.

      • getContinentsRuled

        int getContinentsRuled()
        Retrieves the number of Continents this Player rules
        Returns:
        Number of Continents ruled.

      • getDistributableArmyStrength

        int getDistributableArmyStrength()
        Deprecated. use getDistributableArmy() then Army.getStrength()
        Retrieves the strength of the army that this Player has available to distribute during the reinforce state of the game.
        Returns:
        Distribute-able army strength

      • getDistributableArmy

        Army getDistributableArmy()
        Retrieves the Army that this Player has available to distribute during the reinforce state of the game.
        Returns:
        Distribute-able Army

      • getTotalArmy

        Army getTotalArmy()
        Retrieves all the units in the Countrys that this Player owns combined.
        Returns:
        Total Army.

      • getPoints

        int getPoints()
        Retrieves all the number of points that this Player has.
        Returns:
        Number of points player has.
